description:
Situated in Bushwick, this welcoming 3-bedroom apartment is perfect for anyone coming for a short visit or a long stay. The surrounding area is full of fantastic bars, restaurants and cafés, and the adjacent L and M trains will take you to Williamsburg or manhattan in 15 minutes. 

The apartment has 3 spacious double rooms with a comfortable open plan living area in between. We're located in a newly renovated building with great facilities, rooftop access and Manhattan views.
name: Lovely 3 bed - perfect location!
